Class BlockBase

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.registries.ForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.world.level.block.Block>
net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockBehaviour
net.minecraft.world.level.block.Block
io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.base.BlockBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Registerable, net.minecraft.world.level.ItemLike, net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeBlock, net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.world.level.block.Block>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlockBE
public class BlockBase extends net.minecraft.world.level.block.Block implements Registerable
Base class for blocks for mods using ModXRegistration. This will automatically set the creative tab if it's defined in the mod and register a block item.

  • Method Details

    • getAdditionalRegisters

      public Set<Object> getAdditionalRegisters​(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation id)
      Description copied from interface: Registerable
      Gets additional items that should be registered. Those may be Registerable as well. These objects will be registered with the same id as this registerable.
      Specified by:
      getAdditionalRegisters in interface Registerable

    • initializeItemClient

      public void initializeItemClient​(@Nonnull Consumer<net.minecraftforge.client.IItemRenderProperties> consumer)
      Called from the item for this block from Item.initializeClient(Consumer). Can be used to set client properties for the block item.
